channel.title: 1.7.2.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 1.7.2.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.2.5
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.5 is now available. This is a security release for all previous versions of PrestaShop 1.7.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.2.4
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.4 is now available. This is a security release for all previous versions of PrestaShop 1.7.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.2.3
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.3 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 17 issues reported on version 1.7.2.x.

item.title: About the 1.7.2.2 performance improvement
item.description: A small line might have gone unnoticed in the PrestaShop 1.7.2.2 release announcement: “1.7 front-end should now be faster than 1.6’s for popular stores”. What does it apply to, and how did we test for such performances? Here’s how.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.2.2
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.2 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 8 issues reported on version 1.7.2.

item.title: 6 months of PrestaShop
item.description: July is almost over and more than 6 months have come and gone since the beginning of the year. Time to gather some numbers and make sense of them. Infographic included!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.2.0 is available!
item.description: Dear community. You’ve all been waiting for it. So have we. PrestaShop 1.7.2.0 is here.

item.title: How we're introducing Vue JS & a Symfony API
item.description: If you follow the Core Weekly or our recent GitHub activity, you may have seen that we introduced a new front-end technology in the PrestaShop back office: Vue.js. So, let’s talk a little about it to see what’s coming up.

item.title: Stock management in PrestaShop 1.7 - part 3
item.description: In the previous episodes, we’ve seen the motivations for designing a new stock management interface and how we’ve built it. By now, you must be pretty eager to see what it looks like for real… So let’s dive into the features of this new page of PrestaShop 1.7.2.0.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.2.0 RC1 is open for feedback!
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.0 Release Candidate is now ready for you to test!

item.title: Stock Management in PrestaShop 1.7 - part 2
item.description: In a previous article, we’ve explained the reasons why we’re rebuilding the stock management system in 1.7. We detailed the initial brief of this project: the context, our intentions, what was out-of-scope and the expected outcome. In this article, I want to dive into our methodologies and the main steps of this project.

item.title: Stock Management in PrestaShop 1.7
item.description: In late 2016, the PrestaShop product team took a challenging decision: rebuild the stock management system of PrestaShop 1.7. At the origins of this project was a thorough investigation and a truth-facing moment.
